mapper.insert: insert into request(product_id, member_id, name, email, phone_number, sdate, edate, receiver, receiver_phone, payment, total_price, address, rdate) values(${product_id}, ${member_id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{receiver}, #{receiver_phone}, #{payment}, #{total_price}, #{address}, now())
